class.name: VisualShaderNodeVectorScalarSmoothStep
class.brief_description: Calculates a vector SmoothStep function using scalar within the visual shader graph.
class.description: Translates to [code]smoothstep(edge0, edge1, x)[/code] in the shader language, where [code]x[/code] is a scalar. Returns [code]0.0[/code] if [code]x[/code] is smaller than [code]edge0[/code] and [code]1.0[/code] if [code]x[/code] is larger than [code]edge1[/code]. Otherwise the return value is interpolated between [code]0.0[/code] and [code]1.0[/code] using Hermite polynomials.
